bulkImportProductCategory.downloadSectionTip: Download the template file, we will be creating multiple Product Categories at once using this file;
bulkImportProductCategory.instructionOne: 1. The downloaded file: 'Lipi Product Category Bulk Upload CSV.csv', is a CSV format file, you can use any Spreadsheet software to view and update this file. It should look like this:
bulkImportProductCategory.instructionTwo: 2. Enter a unique product category Name like so;
bulkImportProductCategory.instructionThree: 3. Enter a Unit of the product category, example: kg, piece or box;
bulkImportProductCategory.instructionFour: 4. Enter Purchase Price, Sale Price and VAT percentage of the product category;
bulkImportProductCategory.instructionFive: 5. Enter either 'percent' or 'fixed' as Discount Type, and the amount under Discount Amount;
bulkImportProductCategory.instructionSix: 6. Under Returnable enter 'yes' if customers can return this product category, 'no' if not;
bulkImportProductCategory.instructionSeven: 7. All the fields must be entered, like below, or else Lipi will not accept this file;
bulkImportProductCategory.uploadSectionTip: Upload the CSV file containing Product Category data;
bulkImportProductCategory.successfullyImported: Import Successful, total product categories created
bulkImportProductCategory.rowsIgnored: Following rows had to be ignored
bulkImportProductCategory.nameUsed: Product Category with this name already exists
bulkImportProductCategory.errorOccurred: Error Occurred, resolve and try again
bulkImportProductCategory.unableToReadBody: Lipi is unable to read the file you provided.
bulkImportProductCategory.fileProvidedIsNotValidCsv: The file you provided is not a valid CSV file.
bulkImportProductCategory.fileProvidedHasNoData: The file you provided has no data.
